1. Upload the base Polygon model called "Characters" to Mixamo.
this is the one that includes all characters.

2. Find an animation/pack and click download (As fbx for unity)

3. Within the download file select the animation titled "Characters"
 under "Rig" Set to humanoid and create from this model.
Than configure this avatar and select "Enforce T pose"

4 now select all the other animations from that download and do under rig
set to humanoid > copy from other model and select the character avater
you created in the previous step.
